    @allure.feature("Moderation API")
    @allure.story("PATCH /moderation/auction-edit/{id}")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.NORMAL)
    def test_patch_auction_edit_negative(base_url, moderator_token):
        """Negative test for PATCH /moderation/auction-edit/{id} with invalid data"""
    
        auction_id = 6313
        url = f"{base_url}/moderation/auction-edit/{auction_id}"
        headers = {
            "accept": "application/json",
            "Authorization": f"Bearer {moderator_token}",
    
        }
    
        invalid_payload = {
            "price": "invalid_price",  # ❌ Not a number
            "status": "unknown_status",  # ❌ Invalid value
            "comment": ""  # ❌ Empty comment
        }
    
        with allure.step("Send PATCH request with invalid data"):
            response = requests.patch(url, headers=headers, json=invalid_payload)
            allure.attach(str(response.status_code), "Status Code")
            allure.attach(response.text, "Response Body")
    
        with allure.step("Validate error response"):
            assert response.status_code in [400, 422, 403, 404], f"Expected 400/422/403, got {response.status_code}"
>           json_data = response.json()
